summary: A Californian teenager's plan to come out at his Nebraskan family reunion gets derailed when a bloodstain on his young cousin's dress makes him the unwitting suspect of abuse.
cast: Logan Miller|Robin Weigert|Josh Hamilton|Richard Schiff|Ursula Parker|Azura Skye|Elizabeth Franz|Ashley Gerasimovich|Grant Young|Seth Young|Amy Hostetler|Ella Jaixen|Athena Mostek
title: Take Me to the River
